module.name: fpg_trayicon
module.short: Provides an icon for an application in the system tray

element.name: TfpgSystemTrayIcon
element.short: The TfpgSystemTrayIcon class provides an icon for an application in the system tray

descr.p: Modern operating systems usually provide a special area on the desktop, called the system tray or notification area, where long-running applications can display icons and short messages.
Modern operating systems usually provide a special area on the desktop, called the system tray or notification area, where long-running applications can display icons and short messages.

element.name: TfpgSystemTrayIcon.OnPaint
element.short: Allows custom painting of the tray icon
element.descr: . If you need more that simply a icon, you can use the OnPaint event to do any custom painting of the tray area.

element.name: TfpgSystemTrayIcon.ImageName
element.short: Defines what icon to display in the tray area

element.name: TfpgSystemTrayIcon.PopupMenu
element.short: Sets the specified menu to be the context menu for the system tray icon
element.descr: . The menu will pop up when the user requests the context menu for the system tray icon by clicking the mouse button.
